name: Tap Smash Repeat
description:
This is my first game, didn't know anything about game dev... just made because of interest :) I had lots of fun making it and learned a hell lot!

You are put in a 1v1 match with an online player (or a bot joins in after some wait if no one is there) and you both compete to destroy your block before the other.

There are 3 modes,

  1.  Wood mode - More about speed, breaks fast.
  2. Stone mode - Goodness of both worlds.
  3. Obsidian - Endurance :P This will take 100+ taps to break. So you need finger stamina

Thanks to Minimalistic Game jam for providing motivation and goal! ^^ I'll definitely try to make more in future.
